MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG11 postcode area of Lockerbie. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have managed to restore power to a number of properties, we are installing fault finding equipment on our overhead line network to help identify the fault location and further network checks are being carried out, we now expect your supply to be restored by Midnight. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.18pm on Tuesday 19th January 2021.
